name: CAST (badbonesproductions)
description:
From the creator of "The Pads Game".

This is the downloadable version of the iOS / Android game. For a better experience (world leaderboard etc.) check it on mobile stores.


CAST - Card Fast Game is a very simple but addictive cards solitaire game with some strategic aspects.
The goal is to collect as many points as possible sliding your card on the others and in order to do so, you need to change your color if necessary to catch or avoid the other cards but pay attention to your value, if you go down to sub zero, your game will be over.


Every card in the game is good if is of the same color of yours but can be bad if not.


Play it using a strategic way but be careful, it's very addictive...


Key Features:
- Single swipe movement
- Single card game
- Simple but very hard mechanic
- Retro American Jazz inspired design
- Addictive and funny
- Colourful
- The match can lasts some seconds to hours


Enjoy and good luck.
